OOC: Just so you know Yanshosh, the Stunticons were very powerful when they
rammed things. It wouldnt do as much damage to a tank granted, but it would
still hurt.

BIC:
The charge nails Drag Strip, who is not in control of his body anyways. He
is struck quite hard and the explosion can be heard for miles around. The
impact sends Drag Strip twirling backwards, as he rises towards the sky,
energy vapor following him.

"Ho whoa, bad luck Drag Strip" yells Wildrider maneuvering through the air
to avoid the missile. He then closes in on the tank, coming down fast.
"Let's see ya stop this turkey". He yells.
